description:
nova-objectstore doesn't use amqp at all, so it manages just fine without rabbitmq on boot.


nova-api doesn't have any consumers, so doesn't need to connect to amqp on boot.

Every other component fails if it does not have access to rabbitmq when it starts.

All of them (except objectstore) fail if rabbitmq goes away or gets restarted or something. They do not reconnect gracefully at all. :(
title: Fails if rabbitmq isn't around or drops connection
